question:
National Housing Bank (NHB), the apex institution of housing finance in India, provides loan to __
  1. Housing Finance Companies
  2. Commercial banks
  3. Co-operative sector Banks
Choose the correct options:
explanation: National Housing Bank started its operations from July 1988. The NHB is the regulator and supervisor of Housing Finance Companies (HFCs)in the country. It extends Finance to all housing finance institutions including Housing Finance Companies, commercial banks and co-operative sector institutions
